welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ferraz de Vasconcelos, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Mirella Doces

restaurants.address: Av: 15 de Novembro, 76, Ferraz de Vasconcelos, SP

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Congonhas International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to domestic flights, mainly operated by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport, but may experience slower speeds during peak hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santos Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Santos Airport, mainly used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours per day. Additional time can be purchased for a fee.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sao Jose Dos Campos Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
